column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////I made up for the price discrepancy by also indulging in bone marrow
column2: which is not unlike the marrow you'll find in Bavette's sister restaurants like Au Cheval and Maude's. In terms of others
column3: the elote-style corn is the most recommended
column4: and also well-deserved. It's a wholly decadent side
column7: and parmesan. If you like pampering with a kick
column8: the corn's your huckleberry. And yeah
column9: that seafood tower is both visually and tastily impressive. The grand tower is replete with shellfish galore
